2. Symphysis-fundal height (SFH) measurement 
• This is used for estimation of gestational age if the dates from the last menstrual period are unknown or 
unreliable, in the presence of a normal singleton pregnancy, and when no early ultrasound is available.  
• When using the SFH chart to determine gestation at the first visit, the measured SFH is plotted onto the 50th 
centile line on the SFH graph, allowing the correspond
